text: bike lanes are lifesavers...until winter hits 😂
gotta switch it up when those flurries start flying - trust me, subway cram sessions > frostbite any day! pro tip = streamlining your playlist can lowkey improve the sardine-can scenario🚇✨
friends seem sorted... i call bs 🙃
goal-setting sounds good on paper but tbh it's just one piece of the mess... feels like some parts just refuse to fit no matter what lol

tweaking goals is cool but doesn't magically untangle all the chaos – some stuff goes beyond lists & checkboxes 🤷‍♀️ ever tried visualizing where ya wanna be? sometimes works better than a to-do list!
found yearly expense for psychic readings...during earnings report season 😂
Data science too... Merit wins but biases do surface sometimes.
felt this too... sometimes they just want numbers without narratives 😒
it's like some folks think 'data' means just charts - igniting change needs those narratives backed by solid stats though!
data science used to be super male-dominated but i'm seeing way more diversity lately...even at leadership levels which really shakes up old-school views!
definitely more balanced now but those ceilings? yep still there...
yeah data science used to have way more dudes but now we're seeing all sorts pop up! diversity's definitely shaking things up at work - super cool to witness 👍
leadership's way more varied now too!
